member.name: M:NetCoreServer.HttpsSession.OnReceivedCachedRequest(NetCoreServer.HttpRequest,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Handle HTTP cached request received notification
member.remarks:
Notification is called when HTTP request was received from the client and the corresponding cached content was found.
Default behavior is just send cached response content to the client.
